text: @BBCWorld Nothing's by accident. This is payback for all the defenseless, beautiful animals & wildlife you've killed at your stupid wet markets. Each death from COVID-19 = an animal that you've slaughtered over the years! Stop this barbaric & evil ritual. Get real jobs
